description: A healthy fried rice, full of flavour, with a warming hint of chilli.
name: Fried Rice with Kale & Spinach Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook microwave rice, following packet directions.
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium low heat. Add onion and cook, stirring for 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook, stirring for a further 3 minutes.
Add the kale and spinach mix and stir until wilted. Add the rice and cook, stirring for a further 2 minutes.
Crack 4 eggs, separately, into the rice mixture, stirring between each to cook and mix through. Add the soy sauce, stirring through.
Divide mixture between 4 bowls and top with slices of tofu.
